text: Pampulha may refer to: * Pampulha (Belo Horizonte), a neighborhood of Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brazil in an administrative district of the same name * Belo Horizonte/Pampulha – Carlos Drummond de Andrade Airport (also known as Pampulha Airport), an airport in the Pampulha neighborhood of Belo Horizonte * Lake Pampulha, a lake in Belo Horizonte * Pampulha Modern Ensemble, a UNESCO World Heritage Site * Pampulha (Uberlândia), a neighborhood of Uberlândia, Minas Gerais
title: Pampulha
